name: Hsoub I/O Nightly Mode
css: @-moz-document domain("io.hsoub.com"){body{background:#333539;color:rgba(255,255,255,.54)}.btn-dummy-link,.btn-link,.btn-primary,a{color:rgba(255,255,255,.87)}.btn-primary{background-color:#ff333d;border-color:#ff333d}#versionsModal .modal-body,.dropdown-menu,.hsoub-bars,.hsoub-dropdown,.hsoub-header,.hsoub-list,.hsoub-logo,.hsoub-menu-item,.hsoub-search,.hsoub-searchbar,.hsoub-sidebar,.hsoub-sidebar-search,.lvl-0,.lvl-12,.lvl-16,.lvl-20,.lvl-24,.lvl-4,.lvl-8,.modal-content,.nav-tabs .dropdown-menu,.profileBreif,.profileImg,.singleAsk,.userCardContainer,.white,.white-bg{background:#2e3034!important}.hsoub--pin:after{border-bottom-color:#2e3034}.hsoub-bars.hsoub--active,.hsoub-bars:focus,.hsoub-bars:hover,.hsoub-menu-item.hsoub--active .hsoub-menu-item-link,.hsoub-no-touch .hsoub-menu-item-link:focus,.hsoub-no-touch .hsoub-menu-item-link:hover{background-color:#333539!important}.hsoub-dropdown-item-link{color:rgba(255,255,255,.54)}.hsoub-dropdown-item-link:hover{background:0 0;color:rgba(255,255,255,.87)}.infoBlocks .inf .contBlock{background:#333539}.nailthumb-container{border:1px solid #333539}.hsoub-header{box-shadow:0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.2),0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12)}.dropdown-menu,.hsoub-dropdown,.hsoub-list{border:0;box-shadow:0 6px 6px -3px rgba(0,0,0,.2),0 10px 14px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 4px 18px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.12)}.blockW,.btn-default,.communityCard,.formBg,.itemsList .listItem,.nav-tabs .dropdown-menu,.notificationsList,.select2-dropdown,.userCardContainer,.white{box-shadow:0 3px 1px -2px rgba(0,0,0,.2),0 2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.14),0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.12)}.nav-tabs{border-color:#2e3034}.nav-tabs>li.active>a,.nav-tabs>li.active>a:focus,.nav-tabs>li.active>a:hover,.nav-tabs>li>a:hover{color:rgba(255,255,255,.87);border-color:#ff333d}.nav-tabs>li>a,.postDetails .dropdown-toggle{color:rgba(255,255,255,.54);border-color:#333539}.lvl-1,.lvl-11,.lvl-13,.lvl-15,.lvl-17,.lvl-19,.lvl-21,.lvl-23,.lvl-25,.lvl-3,.lvl-5,.lvl-7,.lvl-9{background:#34363a}.lvl-10,.lvl-14,.lvl-18,.lvl-2,.lvl-22,.lvl-6{background:#3d3f44}.articleCont h1,.articleCont h1 a,.community-card h2 a,.dropdown-menu>li>a,.lightBoxCommunity h2 a{color:rgba(255,255,255,.87)}.blockW,.community-card,.communityCard,.formBg,.itemsList .listItem,.lightBoxCommunity{background:#2e3034}.btn-default{color:rgba(255,255,255,.54);background-color:#2e3034;border-color:#2d2f33}.articleCont h1.articleTitle,.ask .msgTitle,.checkboxList,.commentContent,.communityCard h2,.email,.hsoub-dropdown-divider:before,.hsoub-list-action-link,.hsoub-list-item:not(:first-child),.hsoub-sidebar-search,.latestComments li,.mnuTitle,.modal-footer,.modal-header,.notification,.postDetails>ul>li,.postQuestion .postDetails,.radioList,.replyContent,.underline,.userBasicInfo,.version .name .date,hr{border-color:rgba(255,255,255,.1)}.dropdown-menu .divider,.rateColumn .pointsDetails .v{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.1)}.ask .msgTitle,.post_vote .fa,.searchBreif h1 span{color:#ff333d}.commentBox,.form-control,.hsoub-sidebar-menu-item.hsoub--active>.hsoub-sidebar-menu-item-link{background:#3d3f44;border-color:#3d3f44;color:rgba(255,255,255,.87)}.close,.commentTxt,.hsoub-list-action-link,.hsoub-menu-item-link,.select2-container--default .select2-selection--single .select2-selection__rendered,button.close{color:rgba(255,255,255,.54)}.editable,div[contentEditable=true]{background-color:#333539;border:1px solid #333539}.hsoub-bars-icon{background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.54);box-shadow:0 6px 0 0 rgba(255,255,255,.54),0 -6px 0 0 rgba(255,255,255,.54)}.hsoub-sidebar-menu-item-link,.post-title .postDetails a,.post-title a,.postDetails .dropdown-menu>li>a{color:rgba(255,255,255,.87)}blockquote{border-color:#292929}.hsoub-sidebar-menu-item-link:hover{background:0 0!important;color:#ff333d}.checkboxList h4,.hsoub-list-item-link,.option input[type=checkbox]:checked+span:before,.radioList h4{color:#ff333d}.hsoub-searchbar{border-color:#2e3034}.hsoub-no-touch .hsoub-sidebar-menu-item-link:focus,.hsoub-no-touch .hsoub-sidebar-menu-item-link:hover,.nav>li>a:focus,.nav>li>a:hover{background:0 0}.blockW .formBg,.form-control:focus{box-shadow:none}.editable_area:focus,.form-control:focus,.post_area:focus{border-color:#ff333d}.select2-container--default .select2-selection--single,.select2-dropdown{background-color:#3d3f44;border-color:#3d3f44}.select2-container--default .select2-search--dropdown .select2-search__field,.select2-container--default .select2-search--dropdown .select2-search__field:focus{background:#2e3034;border-color:#2e3034}#HsoubFooterWrapper::before,#versionsModal .modal-footer{border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1)}.select2-container--default .select2-results__option--highlighted[aria-selected]{background-color:#ff333d}.email:hover,.notification:hover{background:#3d3f44}.hsoub-list-item.hsoub-highlight{background:#333539}.nav .open>a,.nav .open>a:focus,.nav .open>a:hover{background-color:#ff333d!important;color:#fff!important}.dropdown-menu>.active>a,.dropdown-menu>.active>a:focus,.dropdown-menu>.active>a:hover,.dropdown-menu>li>a:focus,.dropdown-menu>li>a:hover,.postDetails .dropdown-menu [role=menuitem]:hover i,.sub_filter .dropdown-menu>.active>a,.sub_filter .dropdown-menu>.active>a:focus,.sub_filter .dropdown-menu>.active>a:hover{background:0 0;color:#ff333d}.expander-wrapper,.version{background:#333539}.btn-dummy-link:focus,.btn-dummy-link:hover,.btn-link:focus,.btn-link:hover{color:#ff333d}.version{border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1)}.diff del,.diff ins{color:#333}.version .name{color:#ff333d!important}.bootbox-body input{background:#17181a;border:0;border-radius:4px;padding:7px 8px 4px;margin-top:10px}#HsoubFooterIframe{display:none}#HsoubFooterWrapper::before{content:"تذييل الصفحة - حسوب";background:#2e3034!important;padding:20px;text-align:center;display:block}#HsoubFooterWrapper:hover #HsoubFooterIframe{display:block}}
